```{r setup}
library(KhelpeR)
library(data.table)
library(mlbench)
library(magrittr)
```

```{r}
data("BreastCancer")
dataset <- data.table::as.data.table(BreastCancer)
```

```{r}
discrete_test_hypoth_bin2(
  dataset = dataset,
  group_var = "Class"
) %>% KhelpeR::html_table(merge_rows = "discrete_test_hypoth_bin2")
```
